Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet & comfortable!”
Reviews.Author: Emma S
Reviews.Content: booked stay 3 nights 12th feb staying week playa del carmen busy commerical stay centre expect 2 minutes walk noise noise noise bit centre peaceful youd sleep takes 20 mins walk town cab beaches 23 road fiance backpacking spent 2 months mexico found value weve stayed double bed shared bathroom hostel centre apartment ourselves luxury cooking studio apartments clean comfortable bed free water bottle cleaning day sofa air con wifi etc id disagree review below agree probably depends looking youre travelling expecting hotel extensive kitchen private apartment probably willing pay bucks check playa del carmen imagine easily youre looking quiet friendly economical facilities home bet value weve playa del carmen absolute steal

Reviews.Title: “We ended up moving somewhere else”
Reviews.Author: XtinaY
Reviews.Content: terrible depends traveling expectation cheap arrived told website taxi bus station hotel printed none taxi drivers 2 taxis circled taxi driver annoyed corner walking road thats construction road wasnt walkable anyway cant blame guess remember print possibly print stayed apartment floor basic ive kitchen close pans pots basic bed 2 thin pillows sheet cover funny bathroom am 54 sit toilet feet exact feeling expect shower corner bathroom shower curtain stop mess alright settled walked playa del carmen 45 minutes walk pensioners walk slower cross highway pdc walking till town trust town eat sitting pool read books doesnt exist pool exactly attractive dont beach chair cant complain maybe woman funny 1 dump toilet own output garbage clean everyday dont feel 2 absolutely hanging clothes roombut beach 7 days 3 sets swimming suits suggested laundry service 3 breakfast bananas specified outside eaten guess am reminded 4 add facebook book thanks thank guess depends aiming relax thats diving course stay leave diving shop 7 rush time days moved hotel closer pdc easily walked read tripadvisor agreed placeand guess expectation actually enjoy stay guess spoiled time cancun properly resort hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Find”
Reviews.Author: Jeanette S
Reviews.Content: little gem playa del carmen free wifi beautiful courtyard clean spacious friendly service little money 2 adult children shared 3 comfortable beds bath ac kitchenette 60 height tourist season eve highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay away from the action”

Reviews.Content: moving pdc inexpensive stay provided breakfast pet friendly fit bill hotela bed breakfast apartment hotel nice allowed look deciding apartment nice grassy looked included separate living couch kitchen separate bedroom delightful clean looked street bed breakfast robinson looking house pool breakfast served liked look cabin stayed stone walls authentically mexico dont youd wrong apartment hotel bigger youre people option breakfast bread am jam butter fresh fruit consisting papaya watermelon cereal coffee tea nice common kitchen guests pool busy trying term live rent bikes bit hassle require 5000 deposit rent bikes 100 pesos week reasonable bike locks included hotel neighborhood locals live found convenient doing restaurants close theres nice public park nearby enjoyed complaint spoke english wasnt deal werent able communicate employees called owner vanessa speak english hard clean constantly dont youll disappointed

Reviews.Title: “cold showers!?!”
Reviews.Author: travelr88
Reviews.Content: nice five days stay cold showers hot water available supposedly due solar powered water called owner understanding particulary friendly actually mad calling tell charge phone call overall staff friendly feel awkward entire stay location beach wifi goes sometimes doesnt

Reviews.Title: “TRULY WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE...WOULD ABSOLUTELY GO BACK!!”
Reviews.Author: deisen54
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 weeks friends am ai resorts perfect owner staff absolutely wonderful apartment clean comfortable equipped kitchen diningroom livingroom king bed complete bathroom shower 14 suites gather beautiful courtyard evening cocktails play music fun continental breakfast table courtyard 730 am coffee fresh homemade bread everyday choice dry cereals fruit apartments 15 minute walk main street beach lovely walk cab 2 usd grocery store 3 blocks tvs tv vacation free wifi internet spent day beaches 5th nice home home night located quiet residential bar street travelled alot countries getting value money looking ai check absolutely
